languages.text: "А вы просите офицеров сдать оружие, потому что оно пугает чернь? Если нет, то вопрос закрыт".
"Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."
languages.original_text: "А вы просите офицеров сдать оружие, потому что оно пугает чернь? Если нет, то вопрос закрыт".

traits.locale_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."
"Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."
"Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."
"Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."
"Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

languages.text: 「暴徒を怯えさせるからといって、士官たちに武器を手放せと命じるのか？そんなことはないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

traits.locale_text: 「暴徒を怯えさせるからといって、士官たちに武器を手放せと命じるのか？そんなことはないだろう」

languages.text: "Bittet Ihr denn Eure Offiziere, Ihre Waffen abzulegen, weil sie dem Pöbel Angst machen? Ich dachte es mir."
languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

traits.locale_text: "Bittet Ihr denn Eure Offiziere, Ihre Waffen abzulegen, weil sie dem Pöbel Angst machen? Ich dachte es mir."

languages.text: « Demandez-vous à vos officiers de sortir sans leurs armes parce qu'elles font peur à la populace ? C'est bien ce que je pensais. »
languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

traits.locale_text: « Demandez-vous à vos officiers de sortir sans leurs armes parce qu'elles font peur à la populace ? C'est bien ce que je pensais. »

languages.text: «¿Pide usted a sus oficiales que depongan sus armas porque asustan a la plebe? Pues eso».
languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pide usted a sus oficiales que depongan sus armas porque asustan a la plebe? Pues eso».

languages.text: “你会要求你的军官主动放下武器，担心会吓坏那些乌合之众吗？我认为不会。”
languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

traits.locale_text: “你会要求你的军官主动放下武器，担心会吓坏那些乌合之众吗？我认为不会。”

languages.text: "Ayaktakımı tırsıyor diye subaylara silahlarını bırakmaların emrediyor musun? Hiç sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."

traits.locale_text: "Ayaktakımı tırsıyor diye subaylara silahlarını bırakmaların emrediyor musun? Hiç sanmıyorum."

languages.original_text: "Do you ask your officers to surrender their weapons because they scare the rabble? I thought not."
